QuestData.Title: Keeping Up Appearances
QuestData.Description: The ethereals are clever and very observant, so it's no accident that I'm here posing as a simple furrier. In fact, I've been sent from Area 52 to appraise the technology the ethereals use to generate their eco-domes.$B$BI'd like to enlist your help, $c. We've been asked to use non-goblin agents whenever possible.$B$BWhat I want you to do is bring me a number of ripfang lynx pelts in the guise of a hunter. You can find the lynxes all over Eco-Dome Midrealm.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring 10 Ripfang Lynx Pelts to Shauly Pore at Midrealm Post.
QuestData.CompletionText: <Shauly raises his voice so as to catch the attention of the ethereals in the area.>$B$BHave any pelts to sell me?
QuestData.RewardText: <Shauly makes a show of admiring the skins.>$B$BThese are magnificent, utterly magnificent! I'll pay you top coin for these! How much to retain your services?
